definition: sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)

sentences.english: Can you find a audio cassette player?
sentences.chinese: 你能找到一個盒帶錄音機嗎？

sentences.english: At that moment I understood why Larry rushed to the recording mahcine every time he went back home.
sentences.chinese: 我這才明白爲什麼拉瑞每天回家直奔電話錄音機。

sentences.english: You can keep my recorder for three days.
sentences.chinese: 我的錄音機你可以假座三天。

sentences.english: These days I am practicing it with my casette tape recorder at home.
sentences.chinese: 這幾天，我正在家裏配合錄音機練習。

sentences.english: A new cassette recorder recorded their love swear.
sentences.chinese: 一臺嶄新的盒式磁帶錄音機記錄下他們愛的誓言。

sentences.english: This is a very expensive tape-recorder.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個非常貴重的錄音機。

sentences.english: The new double-cassette recorder was a hot number in the shop.
sentences.chinese: 這種新式的雙卡錄音機成了這家商店的暢銷貨。

sentences.english: This paper investigates a full auto-sLop mechanism used in some kind of cassette tapereeorders made in.
sentences.chinese: 本文對日本盒式錄音機的一種全自停機構作了研究。

sentences.english: Well, what is this video tape recorder for?
sentences.chinese: 用錄音機把這次談話錄下來。

sentences.english: Use drums and gongs , megaphones and recorders to help.
sentences.chinese: 用鑼鼓，擴音器和錄音機幫忙。

sentences.english: GigBaby! four track recorder, metronome, drum machine.
sentences.chinese: 四軌錄音機，節拍器，鼓機。

sentences.english: Take notes. Using a notebook or tape recorder, retype your dreams when you wake up.
sentences.chinese: 在你醒來時，用筆記本或是磁帶錄音機記錄你的夢境。

sentences.english: I had a four-track and a synthesizer then.
sentences.chinese: 我有一個四軌錄音機和合成器。

sentences.english: Could you show me how to use the recorder?
sentences.chinese: 你能教我怎樣用這臺錄音機嗎？

definition: fig. restless, because of fear or strong emotions
sound track/track number (e.g. on a CD)
a snap of the fingers (idiom); in an instant/in a short moment/in a flash/in the twinkling of an eye
lit. lively dragon and animated tiger (idiom)/fig. vigorous and lively
